summary.span: 错误情况阻止访问或创建 时引发的异常。

span.span: The exception that occurs when an error condition prevents the accessing or creation of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 命名空间中的类 不支持在 Windows 服务或 ASP.NET 应用程序或服务中使用。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service. 尝试从这些应用程序类型之一中使用这些类可能会产生意外的问题，例如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions. 如果要从 Windows 窗体应用程序进行打印，请参阅 命名空间。If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the namespace.
